section.title: Servers and Agents
section.para: Oden Server and Agent are in charge of managing and executing deployment.

Server and Agent checks, senses, lists, transfers, and deploys deployment targets, and these are composed in bundles based on function structure, installation environment, etc.
Oden Server and Agent are composed in individual bundles according to OSGi standard specifications.

section.title: Servers
section.para: Oden Server provides services for integration with various UI environments. User gives command to Oden Server through Oden UI, and Oden Server sends appropriate request to Agent.
Oden Server should be installed in system that has file to be deployed. Read deployment target file in system and send to Agent.

section.title: Agents
section.para: Oden Agent deploys deployment target transferred from Oden Server to designated location, and executes various requests received from Server.
One file should be installed for each deployment server.
